missingData.title: Let's Start Your Adventure!
missingData.description: We need a few details to create your magical story. Let's begin this exciting journey together!

generationComplete.title: Your Story is Ready!
generationComplete.description: Your magical adventure has been crafted with love and creativity!

generationError.rateLimitDescription: We're experiencing high demand right now. Let's try again in just a moment!
generationError.connectionIssueDescription: It looks like there's a connection issue. Please check your internet and try again.
generationError.defaultDescription: We're experiencing some technical issues. Let's try again in just a moment!
generationError.rateLimitHelp: High demand means lots of magical stories being created!
generationError.connectionIssueHelp: Network hiccups happen - we'll get your story created!
generationError.defaultHelp: Don't worry, we'll help you create an amazing story!

generating.title: Creating Your Magical Story
generating.subtitle: Our AI wizards are weaving magic into every word
generating.eta: On average, it takes 60-120 seconds to create a story.
